00040 #ifndef _uicheckbox_h
00041 #define _uicheckbox_h
00042 
00043 #include "uiwidget.h"
00044 #include <utility>
00045 
00046 namespace phys
00047 {
00048     namespace UI
00049     {
00050         class Button;
00051         class MarkupText;
00052         ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00053         /// @class CheckBox
00054         /// @headerfile uicheckbox.h
00055         /// @brief This is a simple widget for storing a bool value.
00056         /// @details
00057         ///////////////////////////////////////
00058         class CheckBox : public Widget
00059         {
00060             protected:
00061                 friend class UIManager;
00062                 Button* Box;
00063                 MarkupText* Label;
00064                 /// @todo Fix the issue with all strings being const, so we can resume use of typedefs here.
00065                 std::pair<std::string,std::string> UncheckedSet;
00066                 std::pair<std::string,std::string> CheckedSet;
00067                 Whole GlyphIndex;
00068                 bool Checked;
00069                 bool CheckLock;
00070                 void SetSpriteSet(std::pair<std::string,std::string>& SpriteSet);
00071                 //void SetUncheckedSprites();
00072                 //void SetCheckedSprites();
00073                 virtual void Update(bool Force = false);
00074             public:
00075                 /// @brief Class constructor
00076                 /// @details The dimensions provided
00077                 /// @param name The name of the button.
00078                 /// @param Position The top left position of the button.
00079                 /// @param Size The size of the Button.
00080                 /// @param Layer Pointer to the Layer that created this button.
00081                 CheckBox(String& name, Vector2 Position, Vector2 Size, Whole Glyph, String &LabelText, UILayer* Layer);
00082                 /// @brief Class destructor.
00083                 virtual ~CheckBox();
00084                 /// @brief Gets whether this checkbox is checked or not.
00085                 /// @return Returns a bool representing whether or not this checkbox is checked.
00086                 virtual bool IsChecked();
00087                 /// @brief Checks to see if the current mouse position is over this widget.
00088                 /// @return Returns a bool value, true if the mouse is over this widget, false if it's not.
00089                 virtual bool CheckMouseHover();
00090                 /// @brief Sets the text label to be displayed with this widget.
00091                 /// @details If a label hasn't been set when this is called, this funtion will create a
00092                 /// new one and set it.
00093                 /// @param Label The text message to display with this widget.
00094                 virtual void SetLabelText(String &LabelText);
00095                 /// @brief Gets the currently set label being displayed with this widget.
00096                 /// @return Returns a string containing the currently set label.  If no label is set this will
00097                 /// return an empty string.
00098                 virtual String GetLabelText();
00099                 /// @brief Sets the unchecked status sprite and an optional unchecked hovered sprite.
00100                 /// @param Unchecked The name of the sprite in the Atlas you wish to set as the unchecked status sprite.
00101                 /// @param Hovered The name of the sprite in the Atlas you with to sed on the unchecked/hovered sprite.
00102                 /// Leaving this to default or passing in a blank string will cause it to ignore this parameter.
00103                 virtual void SetUncheckedSprite(String& Unchecked, String& Hovered = "");
00104                 /// @brief Sets the checked status sprite and an optional checked hovered sprite.
00105                 /// @param Unchecked The name of the sprite in the Atlas you wish to set as the checked status sprite.
00106                 /// @param Hovered The name of the sprite in the Atlas you with to sed on the checked/hovered sprite.
00107                 /// Leaving this to default or passing in a blank string will cause it to ignore this parameter.
00108                 virtual void SetCheckedSprite(String& Checked, String& Hovered = "");
00109                 /// @brief Sets the relative position of this widget.
00110                 /// @details The position is relative to the screen size.  Values range from 0.0 to 1.0.
00111                 /// @param Position A vector2 representing the relative position of this widget.
00112                 virtual void SetPosition(Vector2 Position);
00113                 /// @brief Gets the relative position of this widget.
00114                 /// @details The position is relative to the screen size.  Values range from 0.0 to 1.0.
00115                 /// @return Returns a vector2 representing the relative position of this widget.
00116                 virtual Vector2 GetPosition();
00117                 /// @brief Sets the pixel position of this widget.
00118                 /// @param Position A vector2 representing the pixel position of this widget.
00119                 virtual void SetActualPosition(Vector2 Position);
00120                 /// @brief Sets the pixel position of this widget.
00121                 /// @return Returns a vector2 representing the pixel position of this widget.
00122                 virtual Vector2 GetActualPosition();
00123                 /// @brief Sets the relative size of this widget.
00124                 /// @param Size A vector2 representing the relative size of this widget.
00125                 virtual void SetSize(Vector2 Size);
00126                 /// @brief Gets the relative size of this widget.
00127                 /// @details The size is relative to the screen size.  Values range from 0.0 to 1.0.
00128                 /// @return Returns a vector2 representing the relative size of this widget.
00129                 virtual Vector2 GetSize();
00130                 /// @brief Sets the pixel size of this widget.
00131                 /// @param Size A vector2 representing the pixel size of this widget.
00132                 virtual void SetActualSize(Vector2 Size);
00133                 /// @brief Sets the pixel size of this widget.
00134                 /// @return Returns a vector2 representing the pixel size of this widget.
00135                 virtual Vector2 GetActualSize();
00136                 /// @brief Gets the Button this checkbox is based on.
00137                 /// @return Returns a pointer to the button this checkbox is based on.
00138                 Button* GetCheckBoxButton();
00139                 /// @brief Gets the label for this checkbox.
00140                 /// @return Returns a pointer to the label for this checkbox.
00141                 MarkupText* GetCheckBoxLabel();
00142         };//Checkbox
00143     }//UI
00144 }//phys
00145 
00146 #endif
